def Load(widget): ordemCompra = widget.ProviderWidget if ordemCompra == None or ordemCompra.Entity == None: return
emElaboracao = ordemCompra.Entity.EmElaboracao
if widget.View.Commands["New"] != None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = emElaboracao

def InitializeRow(entity, row): if row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_COMISSOES") != None: row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_COMISSOES").Enabled = entity.OrdemVendaInstance.EmElaboracao and entity.VisibilidadeComandoComissoes
